text: The 1966/67 NTFL season was the 46th season of the Northern Territory Football League (NTFL). St Marys have won their seventh premiership title while defeating Darwin in the grand final by 22 points. ==Grand Final== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left;" |- style="background:#efefef;" ! Premiers ! GF Score ! Runner-up |- | St Marys | 15.9 (99) - 11.11 (77) | Darwin |} == References == Category:Northern Territory Football League seasons NTFL
title: 1966/67 NTFL season
